title: Old-Time Eastern North Carolina Barbecue Sauce Recipe
full_text:
Old-Time Eastern North Carolina Barbecue Sauce Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Rest
4 hrs
Total
4 hrs 5 mins
Serves
128 servings
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
1
gallon
cider vinegar
1 1/3
cups
crushed red pepper
2
tablespoons
black pepper
1/4
cup
salt
Directions
Mix the ingredients and let stand for at least 4 hours.
Barbecue Sauce
No-Cook
